titleStmt.title: word list with syllabification, many biblical names

encodingDesc.p: This file encoded to comply with EpiDoc Guidelines and Schema version 8 http://www.stoa.org/epidoc/gl/5/

revisionDesc.change: Finalized - Revised and re-encoded text, checked metadata.
Finalized - Revised and re-encoded text, checked metadata.
General - Both papyri.info/hgv/65352 and papyri.info/ddbdp/t.varie;;6 no longer exist in the master repository. So once this is finalized there will only be the DCLP file, which is as it should be.
General - Both papyri.info/hgv/65352 and papyri.info/ddbdp/t.varie;;6 no longer exist in the master repository. So once this is finalized there will only be the DCLP file, which is as it should be.

Vote - Return-Straight-to-Sender - Structure: Encode side A and B. Col.2,4, col. 3,5, col. 4,2: include whole word in |ed|. Col. 3,8, col. 4,8, and col. 5,9, col. 7, 16 stauros -> *stauros*. Col. 4,5 λι add diacritic. Col. 4,8 and col. 7,16 encode abbreviations. Col. 5, 9-14 every line should beginn with an upper case zeta (not sigma). Col. 5, 11 and 12, col. 6, 11-12 and 15 encode regularisation. Col. 7, 9 and 16: separate supplements from lacuna: [ σα.?] -> [σα] [.?]

Vote - Return-Straight-to-Sender - Structure: Encode side A and B. Col.2,4, col. 3,5, col. 4,2: include whole word in |ed|. Col. 3,8, col. 4,8, and col. 5,9, col. 7, 16 stauros -> *stauros*. Col. 4,5 λι add diacritic. Col. 4,8 and col. 7,16 encode abbreviations. Col. 5, 9-14 every line should beginn with an upper case zeta (not sigma). Col. 5, 11 and 12, col. 6, 11-12 and 15 encode regularisation. Col. 7, 9 and 16: separate supplements from lacuna: [ σα.?] -> [σα] [.?]

General - For voters and finalizers: do not be put off by the fact that HGV and DDbDP files are associated with this submission. I had to create the DDb file to get the submission to move to DCLP where it belongs. t.varie;;6 has already been deleted from the master repository of DDbDP. The HGV record will also be deleted. Once finalized the DCLP file will be displayed without either DDbDP or HGV data. So go ahead and finalize as usual.
